Links Heart

Heart Side A Configuration!

Instructions

Read currently active device

Click the 'Read Side A Device' button to see what MAC address is activefor that side of the heart.

Write MAC to Side A of Heart

Click the button below to set the MAC of the device you wish to be the active device for side A of the heart.You will need to manually enter the MAC for the wifi card of your device.

Heart Side B Configuration!

Instructions

Click the button below to set the device you are viewing this page from, as side B of the heart.
